Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Youth Services

Items.Title: Oversight - GED Preparation and Testing Procedures
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - GED Preparation and Testing Procedures

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Youth Services

Resolution calling upon the Department of Education to amend its holiday display policy for New York City’s public elementary and secondary schools, to allow a crèche or nativity scene to be displayed during the winter holiday season in the same manner it allows other religious symbols, including the menorah and star and crescent, to be displayed.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dep't of Education to amend its holiday display policy for NYC’s public elementary and secondary schools.

Items.Title: Oversight - GED Preparation and Testing Procedures
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - GED Preparation and Testing Procedures

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Department of Education to amend its holiday display policy for New York City’s public elementary and secondary schools, to allow a crèche or nativity scene to be displayed during the winter holiday season in the same manner it allows other religious symbols, including the menorah and star and crescent, to be displayed.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dep't of Education to amend its holiday display policy for NYC’s public elementary and secondary schools.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Martinez, Crowley, Mealy, Mark-Viverito and Avella
